LocaleLayout.title: Zhivar Sanat Kian
LocaleLayout.description: Zhivar Sanat Kian - Implementation and Operation of Industrial and Mining Projects

Certifications.title: Certifications
Certifications.description: Zhivar Sanat Kian Certifications and Awards

Commerce.title: Services | Trade and Project Supply Items
Commerce.default: Services | Trade and Project Supply Items
Commerce.description: Zhivar Sanat Kian, as an international organization, operates in the field of supply and services related to industrial and mining projects, with the aim of providing comprehensive and effective solutions to various industries. By leveraging technical knowledge, a specialized team, and an extensive network of suppliers and business partners worldwide, we meet the needs of our customers with the highest quality and in the shortest possible time.

Management.title: Services | Industrial and Mining Projects Management
Management.default: Services | Industrial and Mining Projects Management
Management.description: The expertise of Zhivar Sanat Kian lies in providing comprehensive project management services that help the client complete their projects on time, within the defined scope and budget, and with the desired quality. Our team is committed to delivering high-quality services tailored to the unique needs of the client, especially in EPC (Engineering, Procurement, and Construction) projects.

Operation.title: Services | Industrial and Mining Projects Operation
Operation.default: Services | Industrial and Mining Projects Operation
Operation.description: Zhivar Sanat Kian's services in the field of operation of industrial projects include two phases: trial operation and commercial operation.
